definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
(Internet slang) to have a simplistic view of sth (transcription of "too young, too simple" – English words spoken by Jiang Zemin 江澤民|江泽民[Jiang1 Ze2 min2] in chastizing Hong Kong reporters in 2000)

sentences.english: Can design according to customers demand and pattern, the mould arises for the guest.
sentences.chinese: 可按客户要求和图样设计，代客起模具。

sentences.english: These generated particles then create patterns of light that the detectors can distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 这些产生的粒子当时产生探测器能够识别的光图样。

sentences.english: Our factory continues to give the pattern request production when the customer samples provided.
sentences.chinese: 我厂承接客户提供实样，图样要求生产。

sentences.english: A single pictorial composition made by juxtaposing or superimposing many pictures or designs.
sentences.chinese: 由许多画面或图样并列或叠化而成的一个图画作品。

sentences.english: When electrons are shot one at a time, we see the same pattern.
sentences.chinese: 如果电子每次射出一粒，我们也看到相同图样。

sentences.english: The term for Arabesque is a decorative pattern which is typical of Islamic art.
sentences.chinese: 这个名词指典型回教艺术中的装饰图样。

sentences.english: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.english: The admiral flipped the chart and showed a close-up of the submarine.
sentences.chinese: 海军上将翻动图样，展示一幅这艘潜艇的近照。

sentences.english: This handcrafted solid sterling silver ring features a brushed finish band with a cut-out cross.
sentences.chinese: 这款手工纯银戒指采刷面处理，并刻有十字图样。

sentences.english: Automatic Dimensioning is an effective approach to improve the efficiency of mechanical engineering drawings.
sentences.chinese: 尺寸自动标注是提高绘制工程图样效率的有效途径。

sentences.english: They designed another test, it is supposed to produce this pattern.
sentences.chinese: 他们就有设计了一个检验，应该产生这样的图样。

sentences.english: He had been copy the drawing of an antique coin.
sentences.chinese: 他正在临摹一枚古币的图样。

sentences.english: These are representative drawings of real wood veneers.
sentences.chinese: 这里有真实木皮的代表性图样。

sentences.english: Actually the finished carpet is the representation of the design.
sentences.chinese: 实际织成的丝毯是原图样的再现。

sentences.english: One artist even offers Metallica designs.
sentences.chinese: 一名艺术家甚至还提供金属图样。

definition: paper pattern as model in dressmaking/paper patten
rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
